helpPopup.title: Interactive Global Bitcoin Map
helpPopup.subtitle: Find Bitcoin-Accepting Merchants Near You
helpPopup.description: Browse thousands of businesses worldwide that accept Bitcoin payments. Search by location, filter by category, and discover places where you can spend your Bitcoin in the real world.

locationPrompt.title: See places near you?
locationPrompt.description: We can use your device location to show Bitcoin places around you. This data is only used locally and never stored or shared.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about our Bitcoin Map

questions.question: How do I add a new place?
questions.answer: Go to <link.create>add a place</link.create>, fill out the details and submit. Your place will be reviewed before going live.

questions.question: Where can I learn more about the algorithm?
questions.answer: Learn about how places are scored, data is validated, updated, and protected at <link.process>how it works</link.process>.

questions.question: How can I explore all places?
questions.answer: Visit <link.countries>our countries page</link.countries> to filter by region, category, or payment type.

questions.question: Can I suggest updates to an existing place?
questions.answer: Yes—click the 'edit' or 'report' button on a place's page to suggest corrections or updates.

questions.question: How often is place data updated?
questions.answer: We pull data every few hours and re-score and re-rank places daily for accuracy.

questions.question: Can I filter places by Bitcoin payment method?
questions.answer: Yes—on <link.countries>the countries page</link.countries>, filter by on-chain, Lightning, or NFC.

questions.question: Is it possible to export place data?
questions.answer: Yes—download CSV or JSON of the full place list via the 'Export data' link on <link.countries>countries page</link.countries>.

questions.question: Who moderates the submitted places?
questions.answer: Our moderation team, along with community reviewers, verifies all new or updated places before approval.

questions.question: How can I report a closed place or one that stopped accepting Bitcoin?
questions.answer: Use the 'report' button on the place page or reach out via the contact form. We'll verify and update the status.

questions.question: Can my place appear on other maps or apps?
questions.answer: Yes—once approved, your place's OpenStreetMap tags are public and usable by third-party apps.

questions.question: Where can I get help or leave feedback?
questions.answer: Visit our support page (linked in the footer), join our Discord, or send us a message through the contact form.
